item.title: American Government and Politics
item.description: Notes: The Principles of Politics All political behavior has a purpose (Rationality Principle); “Everyone has a goal”. Institutions structure politics (Institution Principle); All politics is collective actions (Collective-action Principle); Political outcomes are the product of individual preferences & institutional procedures (Policy Principle); How we got here matters! (History Principle); Sentences to remember “Game Theory” (Involves Math, Econ, and Pols) “Change politics means changing institutions!” “Interests, Interactions, Institutions!
